name: Cosmic Freya Passive T3
passiveSkills: Grants +50% increase to all stats in battle
Gain Immunity to Crave, Doom, and Dark Ghost
Grants immunity to Permadeath effects, including innate effects

Revive self with full HP and Remove All Negative Effects, including Silver Effects, and heal each ally to full HP, granting them Invincibility, Heal Amp, and Regen for 1 turn, upon death.This Talisman's effects only activates when equipped to the Freya character.
